group.name: Italian Slow Food, Fine Cuisine & Wine

description:
Hello Gastronomers!
The Osteria Il Gusto Italiano proposes a night dedicated to wines of the region of Veneto and Regional Italian cooking.
Here's the Meetup Menu for us.

Starters:
- Sicilian Caponata of the House accompanied by a glass of
Verdicchio from winemaker "Macrina".

- Truffle Mortadella with selection of cheeses (Tuma Persa, Sottocenere & Caciocavallo). The wine in this case will be Gamarett from "Gnome" winemaker. First Course:
- Pumkin Ravioli with Mantuan Pesto (Sausage, Mushrooms, Sage and Parmiggiano); accompanied by a Merlot from "Casa del Piave" winery.

-Paccheri with Glicia (Amatriciana without tomato) & Asparagus sauce. The wine for this plate is Rosso Cornero by "Piancarda" winery.

Dessert:
Selection of Ricotta cheese topped with Tonka Beans, Goa Cinnamon, Modica Chocolate and Wild Berries. The final wine to close our tasting will be a Passito Raboso from "Casa del Piave" winery. If there is any Vegeterian that wants to participate the menu can be adapted.
Contact me for any questions. Hope to see you all soon!
name: Wines from the Region of Veneto paired with Regional Food.
